Var.name: project:description:formats
Var.Var: Uses ApidocSwiftGenerator to generate Swift models, enums, and APIs for Gilt Mobile's apidoc APIs.
Uses [ApidocSwiftGenerator](https://github.com/kyle-dorman/ApidocSwiftGenerator) to generate Swift models, enums, and APIs for Gilt Mobile's [apidoc](http://apidoc.me) APIs.
